pageContext.geocode_address: 425 E Broad St, Westfield, NJ 07090, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Gear up for a full-day LEGO® camp packed with hands-on and minds-on STEM fun! In this challenge based program, build projects inspired by cool machines close to home, such as Gear Cars, Gondolas, Merry-Go-Rounds, and Scissor Lifts. Then build Elemental Dragons, Kais X1-Charger, and Coles Earth Driller from Ninjago City! Engineering and Ninjanuity are the focus of this new full-day themed camp for LEGO® fanatics!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM Challenge + Ninjaneering w/LEGO® Materials: FULL DAY
